overview:
ANDERSON COOK PROPERTY LAWYERS 149 Ballards Lane Finchley London N31LJ. Ph: +447031985855 +44-7031945722
Email: andersoncookfinance@rediffmail.com Email: info@andersoncookfinanc.biz.ly Website: www.andersoncookfinanc.biz.ly

Attn:

We are investment Research Company based in UK we undertake the services of assisting prospective companies both government agencies and individuals to satisfactorily meet the needs of their capital investment abroad.

We have client with substantial amount of US Dollars who is interested to go into joint venture/partnership with a trusted company abroad.

In this view, I am sincerely soliciting for your assistance to explore investment opportunities for my client in your country in the areas of estate development, properties, tourism industry or any profitable investment.

We are a consulting company located in UK, we depend on commission basis that is after all negotiation and the business went through.

Your advice and recommendations in this respect will be welcomed to enabling us handle diligently all expect of this investment operations in your country.

Looking forward for your positive response and counting on your anticipated co-operation. Please respond to my email above.

Thanks and best regards

Anderson Cook Director
